pages.text: inna awhayna ilayka kama awhayna ila nuhin wal-nabiyina min baʿdihi wa-awhayna ila ib'rahima wa-is'maʿila wa-is'haqa wayaʿquba wal-asbati waʿisa wa-ayyuba wayunusa waharuna wasulaymana waatayna dawuda zaburan
warusulan qad qasasnahum ʿalayka min qablu warusulan lam naqsus'hum ʿalayka wakallama l-lahu musa takliman
rusulan mubashirina wamundhirina li-alla yakuna lilnnasi ʿala l-lahi hujjatun baʿda l-rusuli wakana l-lahu ʿazizan hakiman
lakini l-lahu yashhadu bima anzala ilayka anzalahu biʿil'mihi wal-malaikatu yashhaduna wakafa bil-lahi shahidan
inna alladhina kafaru wasaddu ʿan sabili l-lahi qad dallu dalalan baʿidan
inna alladhina kafaru wazalamu lam yakuni l-lahu liyaghfira lahum wala liyahdiyahum tariqan
illa tariqa jahannama khalidina fiha abadan wakana dhalika ʿala l-lahi yasiran
yaayyuha l-nasu qad jaakumu l-rasulu bil-haqi min rabbikum faaminu khayran lakum wa-in takfuru fa-inna lillahi ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi wakana l-lahu ʿaliman hakiman
